entry.title: https://github.com/DaoCloud/public-image-mirror
entry.content: 很多镜像都在国外。比如 gcr 。国内下载很慢，需要加速。致力于提供连接全世界的稳定可靠安全的容器镜像服务。

entry.content: 基于Clash Core 制作的Clash For Linux备份仓库 A Clash For Linux Backup Warehouse Based on Clash Core

entry.title: https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM
entry.content: The command-line tool for quick, simple deployment and management of Linux dedicated game servers.

entry.title: https://github.com/ONLYOFFICE/Docker-DocumentServer
entry.content: ONLYOFFICE Document Server is an online office suite comprising viewers and editors for texts, spreadsheets and presentations, fully compatible with Office Open XML formats: .docx, .xlsx, .pptx and enabling collaborative editing in real time.

entry.title: https://github.com/ONLYOFFICE/DocumentServer
entry.content: ONLYOFFICE Docs is a free collaborative online office suite comprising viewers and editors for texts, spreadsheets and presentations, forms and PDF, fully compatible with Office Open XML formats: .docx, .xlsx, .pptx and enabling collaborative editing in real time.

entry.title: https://github.com/docker-mailserver/docker-mailserver
entry.content: Production-ready fullstack but simple mail server (SMTP, IMAP, LDAP, Antispam, Antivirus, etc.) running inside a container.

entry.content: Sentry, feature-complete and packaged up for low-volume deployments and proofs-of-concept

entry.title: https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite
entry.content: Bazzite is a custom Fedora Atomic image built with cloud native technology that brings the best of Linux gaming to all of your devices - including your favorite handheld.

entry.title: https://github.com/yuaotian/go-cursor-help
entry.content: 解决Cursor在免费订阅期间出现以下提示的问题: You've reached your trial request limit. / Too many free trial accounts used on this machine. Please upgrade to pro. We have this limit in place to prevent abuse. Please let us know if you believe this is a mistake.
